Name: Ovlo
Headline: AI Shopping Assistant for Ecommerce
Description: Ovlo is a plug-and-play conversational AI shopping assistant that understands user intent and speaks in every brand’s unique voice. It helps online stores transform browsing into an engaging experience in minutes on any website, boosting conversation and brand love.

Active_Founders.Name: Amer Eid, Founder
Active_Founders.Description: Co-founder of Ovlo.ai, revolutionizing e-commerce with AI. Previously, Staff Software Engineer at Meta, contributing to WhatsApp for iOS, and Google, enhancing Fitbit’s health and wellness features. Led the development of MENA’s #1 music streaming app, serving millions. Passionate about building impactful, user-focused experiences.

Active_Founders.Name: Andrew Malouf, Founder
Active_Founders.Description: Co-founder of Ovlo, building AI-powered e-commerce search. Previously led products at HelloFresh, Anghami and Amazon, optimizing discovery, supply chain, and user experience for millions of skus and users. 2x founder, including a fintech startup in MENA.

generated_description:
**Ovlo: Revolutionizing Ecommerce with AI Shopping Assistance**

Founded in 2025 and hailing from the vibrant tech scene of San Francisco, Ovlo is tapping into the exciting intersection of AI and online retail. It's not just another shopping assistant; it’s a conversational AI tool designed to transform how customers interact with ecommerce sites, improving their shopping experience while also boosting sales.

**The Mission**  
Ovlo’s mission is straightforward: to provide ecommerce platforms with a plug-and-play AI shopping assistant that aligns with each brand's voice. By understanding user intent, Ovlo makes online browsing more purposeful and engaging, essentially turning casual visitors into committed buyers.

**Key Features**  
- **Conversational Interface**: It allows brands to maintain a unique voice while interacting with customers, making the shopping experience feel personalized.
- **24/7 Accessibility**: Ovlo acts as a virtual assistant that’s always available, guiding customers in finding what they need.
- **Seamless Integration**: With lightning-fast setup for platforms like Shopify, Ovlo learns from the product catalog automatically, minimizing the work for store owners.
- **Multi-Channel Engagement**: Customers can engage through voice or text, catering to their preferences.
- **Insightful Analytics**: Brands can gain insights into customer behavior, understanding the ‘why’ behind every interaction which can help tailor future marketing strategies.

**Engagement Strategies**  
Ovlo encourages ecommerce businesses to book a demo and experience the platform firsthand. This model not only showcases its capabilities but also helps build relationships with potential clients—an essential strategy in B2B marketing.

**The Team**  
Despite its small size, with just two employees, Ovlo is part of Y Combinator's W25 batch. Backed by their partners, like Aaron Epstein, the company is well-positioned to innovate and scale within the AI retail sector.

**Why It Matters**  
As the landscape of online shopping continues to evolve, businesses need tools that enhance customer experiences and drive conversions. Ovlo is positioned to be a crucial player in this space, providing the technological edge needed in a competitive market.

If you’re in the ecommerce space and looking to enhance your customer journey while boosting your revenue, Ovlo could just be the AI solution you've been waiting for. For more information, you can visit their website at [Ovlo.ai](https://ovlo.ai) or reach out at Founders@ovlo.ai.
